content: alevins a design by myla wilson alevins french for fingerlings are a fun way to keep warm in the colder months and still allow for playing with toys and touch screen devices alevins are an easy knit for beginners their straightforward design allows for embellishing or showing off a gorgeous hand dyed colorway basic techniques knitting purling binding off mid project and casting on mid project notions 50 100yds worsted weight yarn always err on the side of a generous amount us7/4 5mm needles double pointed needles or 24 or longer for magic loop gauge 20 stitches = 4 5spi tapestry
